title.label: How is this not #1 on the AppStore?

content.label: THIS GAME DESERVES WAAAAY MORE THAN JUST 5 STARS! I don't know who came up with this incredible idea, but this is my overall favorite game on the entire AppStore. The amount of crazy completely different mini games and levels amazes me. The art and design of it all is magnificent. There are rarely any ads but they are way too easy to X out of so it's pretty cool. It isn't just killing Skeletons, it has so much more than shown in the preview in the AppStore which means this game is a diamond in the dirt just waiting to be dug up. If you are reading this and are curious or considering getting this game....let me help you.....GET IT! There is much more than what you think and they update it regularly which is excellent. I've official run out of positive adjectives to describe this awesomeness.
I've got this on my iPad when I was about 4 (I'm ten) and I loved it! Still love it, brings back memories!!
